attributes.action: Produce id to sign up for social media to prevent trolls making another account
attributes.additional_details: I feel that if it becomes a mandatory requirement for social media platforms then we can really make a difference and stamp out trolling once and for all!
attributes.background: I feel that if you have to produce ID when signing up for social media if you have been reported for bullying and you’ve been warned multiple times then the account should be removed and then they cannot sign up for another as they would have to show ID so they wouldn’t be able to then continue.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Make verified ID a requirement for opening a social media account.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575833

Make it compulsory to submit ID on social media to help end online abuse.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572480
